
# V1 Create Item Request

## Structure

`V1CreateItemRequest`

## Fields

| Name | Type | Tags | Description | Getter | Setter |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `body` | [`?V1Item`](/doc/models/v1-item.md) | Optional | V1Item | getBody(): ?V1Item | setBody(?V1Item body): void |

## Example (as JSON)

```json
{
  "body": {
    "id": "id6",
    "name": "name6",
    "description": "description4",
    "type": "GIFT_CARD",
    "color": "593c00"
  }
}
```
